result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

SIGNATURE BOND CONDITIONS MODIFIED
Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall report to the Dane County Jail to complete the booking/fingerprinting process within 10 days of today. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Robert C, Angela C, or Robert C's immediate family, 
- Defendant is banned from Robert C.'s residence.
- Defendant shall not engage in the solicitation or advertising of any home-improvement work. 
Trial Judge - Br 7
Court entered not guilty plea for defendant. Motions due 20 days. Bail continued.
Br. 7

Defendant Timothy L Satterthwaite in court. Prosecuting Atty Frank John Remington appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Brian William Severson in court for Defendant Timothy L Satterthwaite.  Defendant advised of right to and waived Preliminary Hearing (Preliminary Hearing Waiver signed); Court accepted waiver of Preliminary Hearing and ordered case bound over.
Court amends Bond to no contact with Angela C. or Robert C. or Robert C's immediate family, and ban from Robert C.'s residence. All other conditions remain the same.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall report to the Dane County Jail to complete the booking/fingerprinting process within 10 days of today.

Trial Judge - Br 7 

Defendant has acknowledged and agreed to terms and conditions of bond. Defendant must return signed bond form within 10 days of today. Any bail money previously posted will not be returned until a signed bond form is on file with the Clerk of Courts.

08:54 AM Defendant appeared.  Colleen Lennon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties by Zoom. The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.
